note:
Imagine a friendly bio here.

It's fun to imagine. Even now you are creating a brand new, never before seen version of myself, painting your version of me. You would be doing it even if we were face to face. Every second you spend thinking about me, it gets more detailed. Closer to the truth. Further away. Should I ever get the chance to think about you in return, I'll be doing the same thing.

I hope we do each other justice.
